list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Correct typo in data range comment
Fixed a typo in the comments to correctly specify the upper bound for 'n' as 10^5 instead of 105. This change ensures the comment accurately reflects the intended data range constraints.

task.summary:
Refactor project structure and remove unused files
Deleted old .idea project files and added CMake configuration for the cpp_tctm project. This improves project setup consistency and supports modern C++ standards. New files include cpp_tctm.iml and editor.xml with specific formatting and inspection settings.

Move and clean up 2830 猜数游戏2 files
Relocated `2830.猜数游戏2.cpp` and added the image file `2830.猜数游戏2.png` to a new directory `2830 猜数游戏 2`. Removed detailed comments and description from the `.cpp` file for clarity.

Reorganize binary search guessing game file
Delete the old "2830 猜数游戏2.cpp" and its associated PNG file, then add a new "2830 猜数游戏2.cpp" file with enhanced header comments for better readability and understanding. This new file includes detailed descriptions, input/output examples, and usage instructions.

Move and clean up project files
Relocated `2830.猜数游戏2.cpp` and added `2830.猜数游戏2.png` to a new directory. Removed detailed comments and descriptions from the `.cpp` file for clarity. Updated project structure and removed unused files to maintain consistency.

Correct typo in data range comment
Fixed a typo in the comments to correctly specify the upper bound for 'n' as 10^5 instead of 105. This change ensures the comment accurately reflects the intended data range constraints.

MESSAGE.value:
Refactor project structure and remove unused files
Deleted old .idea project files and added CMake configuration for the cpp_tctm project. This improves project setup consistency and supports modern C++ standards. New files include cpp_tctm.iml and editor.xml with specific formatting and inspection settings.

Move and clean up 2830 猜数游戏2 files
Relocated `2830.猜数游戏2.cpp` and added the image file `2830.猜数游戏2.png` to a new directory `2830 猜数游戏 2`. Removed detailed comments and description from the `.cpp` file for clarity.

Reorganize binary search guessing game file
Delete the old "2830 猜数游戏2.cpp" and its associated PNG file, then add a new "2830 猜数游戏2.cpp" file with enhanced header comments for better readability and understanding. This new file includes detailed descriptions, input/output examples, and usage instructions.

Move and clean up project files
Relocated `2830.猜数游戏2.cpp` and added `2830.猜数游戏2.png` to a new directory. Removed detailed comments and descriptions from the `.cpp` file for clarity. Updated project structure and removed unused files to maintain consistency.

Add Binary Search solution for network cable cutting problem
Implemented a new program to determine the maximum possible length of network cables that can be cut from given inventory to meet a specified count. This solution uses a binary search algorithm to efficiently find the longest length while adhering to precision constraints.

Correct typo in data range comment
Fixed a typo in the comments to correctly specify the upper bound for 'n' as 10^5 instead of 105. This change ensures the comment accurately reflects the intended data range constraints.
